explanation: Funds are available from Section 158 of the Continuing Appropriations Act, 2025, Div. A, P.L. 118-83, as amended by Sec. 101 of the Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2025, Div. A, P. L. 118- 158, appropriated to the Department of Defense and made available for transfer to conduct risk reduction and modification of National Security Systems. This is emergency funding.
